programmes.show_description: Fancy a mash up after midnight? Only massive, ad free anthems to help with your insomnia! More beats, less sleep!
We give you heavy hits, vocal anthems, dirty beats and bangin' basslines. This is the 2010s at it finest!
Join Stephanie Hirst as she spins some awesome belters! From 2000 to 2009! Here's the lowdown on her fav 3 tracks of each year.
No excuses, stop what you are doing, turn it up and party hard with the biggest anthems and classic tracks of the noughties!
An hour of the greatest party anthems ever. Happy times guaranteed! No room for moody people here!
Everybody's free to feel good and Rozalla knows it! So let's join her as she takes us on a journey of her 40 favourite feel good anthems from back in the day.

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
Steph gives us her low down on every thing Eurodance. She's hand-picked 40 absolute bangers so expect: Haddaway, Jam & Spoon, Gala, Livin' Joy and a whole continent more!
Melodic synths, pumping beats and shout out loud lyrics. Live your best life with some Eurodance NRG!
Relive the decade of big-room bangers and the hottest Club belters from 2010 to 2019. Get ready to burn up the carpet and dance yourself silly!
Join Stephanie Hirst as she reveals Clubland's All Time 40! With iconic dancefloor legends, hands in the air anthems and infinitely catchy earworms. It's all here.

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
Fancy a mash up after midnight? Only massive, ad free anthems to help with your insomnia! More beats, less sleep!
Need a fix of 90s club classics? Lock in for a marathon of memories as we take you back to the greatest decade of dance! The 90s!
Join Cascada's leading lady Natalie Horler as she talks us through all of Cascada's Dance Anthems. From 2004 - you won't want to miss this!

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
Whether you're heading to San Antonio or dreaming of past holidays in Ibiza, superstar DJ Jeremy Healy takes us on a homage to the greatest beach anthems ever!
No excuses, stop what you are doing, turn it up and party hard with the biggest anthems and classic tracks of the noughties!
We spinback 3 decades to the birth of Eurodance, the 90s. With Snap, Haddaway, Ace of Base, Alice Deejay and more! A decade of dance awaits.
The latter part of the 90s witnessed the euphoric revolution. With massive 'hands in the air' anthems from Energy 52, Chicane, PVD, Ayla and loads more, this is 100% Euphoria!
Dive into a world of uplifting melodies, driving beats and breakdowns to give you shivers! This is Euphoria at its finest.
Trance and its euphoric sound took over in the early 2000s. The clubs, charts and airwaves were full Angelic, Fragma, iiO, Ian van Dahl and more! This is 100% Euphoria!
25 dance hits of the 00s you've probably forgotten - but no longer! Expect Luck & Neat, Matt Darey, Deep Dish and Basement Jaxx.
No excuses, stop what you are doing, turn it up and party hard with the biggest anthems and classic tracks of the noughties!
Superstar DJ Judge Jules passes Judgement on the state of dance music. Today he's putting the case forward for which is the best 90s dance tune of all time!
Need a fix of 90s club classics? Lock in for a marathon of memories as we take you back to the greatest decade of dance! The 90s!
He may be a legendary CBBC presenter, an Ibiza DJ and Heart's dance master but today Toby Anstis is Clubland TV's total authority on euphoric dance. Hands in the air for this one!
Dive into a world of uplifting melodies, driving beats and breakdowns to give you shivers! This is Euphoria at its finest.
